articles.title: Indices rise for sixth consecutive day amid US trade deal optimism
articles.description: Indian stock markets closed higher for the sixth consecutive day. Gains were fueled by positive reports on trade negotiations between India and the US. Information Technology stocks saw a significant rise. While Reliance Industries shares declined, the overall market sentiment remained optimistic. Investors are awaiting concrete outcomes from the trade deal discussions.

articles.title: Nike’s New Aero-FIT Apparel Is A Tech Play For A Warmer World
articles.description: Nike’s new Aero-FIT cooling technology channels twice the airflow of its legacy fabrics while being made entirely from recycled textile waste — a performance and sustainability test for the sportswear giant.
articles.content:
Nike on Friday unveiled Aero-FIT, a new performance apparel technology it bills as a pinnacle of cooling, designed specifically for the escalating thermal demands of a hotter world.
According to the sportswear giant’s press release, Aero-FIT is engin... [2479 chars]

articles.title: As coal fired-power plants retire, is there a future for the communities?
articles.description: There is a new way to repurpose former coal sites into next generation advanced technology power producers. Is Utah on board?
articles.content:
With 339 power plants retired in the United States and another 157 identified as suitable for redevelopment, there remains an opportunity for communities to reinvent themselves.
It is hard to give up the tradition of mining and operating a power plan... [4679 chars]

articles.title: Alaska Airlines Faces Another IT Turbulence
articles.description: Alaska Airlines grounded all flights Thursday due to a technology outage impacting operations. The stoppage also included Horizon Air, ongoing for 1 hour 10 minutes. This mirrors a previous outage in July. The airline addressed customer concerns and is working to resolve the IT issue swiftly.
articles.content: Alaska Airlines temporarily grounded all its flights on Thursday evening due to a technology glitch impacting its operations. This technical failure, which required a ground stop for all flights, also affected its subsidiary, Horizon Air. The Federal... [641 chars]

articles.title: Alaska Airlines grounds all flights due to technology outage
articles.description: U.S. carrier Alaska Airlines said it had grounded its flights at all airports on Thursday evening due to an unspecified technology outage affecting its operations.
articles.content:
The ground stop also applies to Alaska Airlines' subsidiary Horizon Air, a Federal Aviation Administration advisory showed. The ground stop was requested for a period of 1 hour 10 minutes ending at 0000 GMT, according to the advisory.
Sign up here.
